content: Software Engineer at Redpanda Data, Inc.. My work revolves around the reproducible evaluation of distributed storage, data management and real-time analytics systems. My 2019 PhD dissertation focused on the practical aspects in the reproducible evaluation of systems research, work for which I was awarded the 2018 Better Scientific Software Fellowship.

title: Ivo Jimenez
